generated_body: If you choose to read the article titled "Here's how much it will cost to travel to Africa like Meghan Markle and Prince Harry," you can expect a breakdown of the potential expenses associated with a luxury trip to Africa, inspired by the high-profile travels of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex.
